Trigger.name: Tailsmash
Trigger.script:
if matches[2] == "You" then system.hunting.vars.targetName = matches[3] system.hunting.vars.attacking = true end
if system.hunting.funcs.isHuntingTarget(matches[3]) then system.hunting.funcs.razeShield() end

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) dismissively flicks \w+ tail at (.+), annihilating the magical shield surrounding \w+ with casual ease\.$
^(You) flick your tail at (.+), dismissively brushing aside the paltry shield protecting \w+\.$
^(You) prepare yourself to flick your tail at (.+) before realising that doing so would not actually do anything\.$
